pr_title: SONARJAVA-3201 Rule S4830: Server certificates should be verified during SSL/TLS connections

timeline.message: Update key from  S4424 to S4830 for server certificates check

timeline.bodyText:
Pay special attention to these lines.
To me, this is required to support update from both:

version < 6.0 to 6.1 (first DeprecatedRuleKey)
version > 6.0 to 6.1 (second)

See documentation.
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource
